name: A Night In Hell
description:
(If it doesn't load try refreshing)

For game development practice I attempted to make a Five Nights At Freddy's style game. It took a day and basically turned into a mini version of Pizzeria Simulator.

No FNaF characters are used this is simply reminiscent of that style of game.

Perhaps in the future I'll evolve this into more than FNaF Mini, but for the time being I will leave it at this. Enjoy!

Also there's no lore or anything so don't worry about looking into it. No story either. I don't know why you're in a small room with a monster in the vents. I just thought it was scary.

I'm currently working on an analog horror/Creepy Pasta glitch game in the style of classic computer educational games, so follow me if you're interested in that project.
